replies.author: @tony_anello
replies.text: I was in the Navy when Lone Survivor came out and it was a big hit with all the guys I saw it with. But one thing that stuck out to a few of us in the theater was how dramatic and Hollywood-esque the rescue scene was. We now know that to be completely made up, and it led to me questioning alot of the propaganda I may have fallen for when I first joined. By the time American Sniper came out, I was refuting Chris Kyle's story to all my buddies who were in disbelief over my comments. Which again, we now know to be almost entirely fabricated.

replies.author: @DerekBush-x3t
replies.text: @tony_anello explain

replies.author: @tony_anello
replies.text:
@DerekBush-x3tIt was clear during the first watch of Lone Survivor (with no knowledge of the book) that the scenes after Marcus was taken in by Gulab were fabricated for Hollywood gimmicks. He wasn‚Äôt thrown onto a log seconds away from a beheading. And there was no scene where the choppers stormed in and had a firefight with the village to rescue him. We know now due to After Action Reports and SEALs in the know, that it was indeed made up and so was 90% of the ‚Äúoriginal story.‚Äù

As for Chris Kyle, his total sniper kill count is greatly inflated and his book follows Marcus in being almost entirely dishonest. There‚Äôs a part where he claims to have positioned himself on top of the Superdome during Hurricane Katrina and shot 30 people who were looting. I was made to believe all these spec ops guys were heroes. And many of them that I met during my time, and after, certainly are. But not the ones getting book and movie deals.

replies.author: @Roughneckjarhead
replies.text:
@tylerjaime5094 Here's some things I do know:
I have been in plenty of firefights as a Marine and a contractor for blackwater in the balkans.  I have seen everything from people performing comfortably and people falling apart.  Sometimes the same people reversing behaviors.  I have also seen MANY examples of something happening right in front of my eyes and seeing the same situation on the news and it being 100% complete bullshit.  So, taking from these few examples, I can safely say that we don't know dick about what happened over there.  Show me Gulab's actual words in video form and then we will have "testimony" but still not the truth.  I prefer to take the words of the man who survived as a SEAL, which means a lot.  He also set up the Lone Survivor Foundation, which still keeps taking care of gold star families.  Stupid details about how many mags he had on him mean nothing.  Even if that were true, which it may be, it could be that he gathered mags from his fallen comrades.  I know from experience you are hurling mags at each other in the middle of the shit.  Also, his weapon package wasn't for suppression or target attrition, he was setup as a sniper.  Snipers need roosts and spotters to perform.  They were on the run the entire time.  If you can produce to me, without bullshit from the media, ACTUAL proof of Marcus being a liar, please produce links.

author: @blender_wiki

Imperialist propaganda exhibits boundless influence, with the propagation of falsehoods to rationalize war crimes ingrained in our country's culture for the past 240 years. Hollywood has played a significant role in disseminating imperialistic ideologies worldwide for a century. Entire generations have been shaped by narratives depicting "heroes" who commit acts of violence against innocent people merely seeking to safeguard their lands and families.

Furthermore, propaganda extends its reach into educational materials, including school history books, and infiltrates popular literature for teenagers, as well as cartoons. This pervasive influence seeks to mold perspectives and perpetuate a distorted understanding of historical events and the consequences of imperialistic actions.

author: @austinboswell4023
text: Several things here aren't concrete. So I've watched the videos released by the "Taliban" and from what I can tell is that BOTH Luttrels and Gulabs stories aren't 100% accurate. Yes the video shows way less fighters than Marcus claimed yet we still can hear gunfire the entire time the Taliban fighter 7-10 of them from my count estimate and none of these fighters are engaged in fact there moving TOWARDS the sounds of gun fire. So imagine this, the Taliban suspects there's Americans in the area, ok so what do you do?.you send out MULTIPLE scout patrols to cover the area and once ONE scout platoon makes contact they engage and alert the OTHER fighters and they begin to move towards the combat. That's what I believe the video shows yes 7-10 fighters NOT ENGAGED IN COMBAT but moving to the kill zone and if this one group is moving there I feel it's safe to assume to expect there was AT LEAST ONE other patrol already engaged with the Americans and very likely many more small groups closing in from different areas until finding themselves on that hill ..there's several other discrepancys in this story i keep coming across and many other ones in this video im not going to go into but the main thing i want to puont out is the footage releadef by the Taliban of this attack does raise very signifigant doubt there was over 50 fighters yet the footage ALSO disproves GULLABS account of only 7-10.As the footage shows that exact number of fighters NOT ENGAGED in the beginning of the video yet we can hear OBVIOUS gunfire in the distance. Also this account of how Gulab got deported is a bit rocky as well, all other sources ive read state Gulab left the United States AGAINST the wishes and advice of both Marcus AND his attorney. Gulab experienced unimaginable suffering because of helping Marcus Luttrel when on the contrary Marcus greatly gained from this story and I've read a great deal explaining that when Gulab visited America and step foot on Marcus's ranch and saw how well he was living apposed to himself he became very bitter and resentful towards Marcus and would in fact have a very good reason or at least lean towards the assumption Gulab had a good reason to try to disprove or shed doubt on Luttrels account...we may never know but there's allot of hate being thrown at Lutrel but fact is none of us INCLUDING Gulab were there for the initial ambush.
